name: Soffell Mosquito Repellent
description: Soffell protects the body from mosquito bites with protection that effectively lasts for approximately 8 hours. Soffell offers double protections: First protection: to prevent mosquitoes with Soffell’s aromas. Second protection: to protect the body from mosquito bites by producing unfavorable flavour for mosquitoes to bite. Soffell contains special moisturizer to keep the skin soft. No burning sensations and no stickiness when applied to skin. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
